Welcome to my research website.


1. Download of the phenotypic dataset from Cassavabase [wizard tool](https://cassavabase.org/user/login?goto_url=%2Fbreeders%2Fsearch), use the following filters:
   1. Select the trait list `TraitsLucianoGS`
   2. Select the following `Trial Types`:
      - *Clonal Evaluation*;
      - *Preliminary Yield Trial*;
      - *Advanced Yield Trial*;
      - *Uniform Yield Trial*;
      - *Regional Trials*;
      - *phenotyping_trial*.
   3. Select `Years` from 2010 to 2021.
   4. Select all the `trials` available at cassavabase after the filter.
